data.enText: friendly, peaceful and without any disagreement
arranged together in a pleasing way so that each part goes well with the others
very pleasant when played or sung together

example: the tailored clothes were harmonious with her military bearing

tr: exhibiting equivalence or correspondence among constituents of an entity or between different entities

example.ex: Their harmonious relationship resulted in part from their similar goals...
example.tran: 他们关系融洽的部分原因是他们有着相似的目标。

example.ex: It is a harmonious community where pupils are happy and industrious.
example.tran: 这是一个和睦的集体，学生们开心玩耍，用功读书。

value.def: A harmonious relationship, agreement, or discussion is friendly and peaceful.
value.tran: （关系、协定、讨论）融洽的，和睦的，友好的

example.ex: To live together harmoniously as men and women is an achievement.
example.tran: 夫妻能和睦相处就是一种成就。

example.ex: The architecture is harmonious and no building is over five or six floors high.
example.tran: 这里的建筑风格和谐统一，没有哪座楼房高于五六层。

example.ex: ...a harmonious balance of mind, body, and spirit.
example.tran: 头脑、身体和心灵的协调

value.def: Something that is harmonious has parts which go well together and which are in proportion to each other.

example.tran: 一张五官端正的纯真脸庞

example.ex: ...stone paths that blend harmoniously with the scenery.
example.tran: 与景色和谐融为一体的石子路

example.ex: ...the mysterious skill involved in producing harmonious sounds.
example.tran: 发出悦耳声音的神秘技巧

value.def: Musical notes that are harmonious produce a pleasant sound when played together.
